mapper.select: select count(*) as cnt from tour where member_id = #{_parameter}

select review_no as reviewNo, item_no as itemNo, member_id as memberId, review_rate as reviewRate, review_content as reviewContent, review_date as reviewDate from tour_review where item_no=#{_parameter}
select region_country as regionCountry from region group by region_country order by 1 asc
select region_no as regionNo, region_city as regionCity from region where region_country=#{_parameter} order by 2 asc
select item_no as itemNo from tour where member_id=#{_parameter} order by 1 desc
